# documentCameraViewControllerDidCancel(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the user canceled out of the document scanner camera.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func documentCameraViewControllerDidCancel(_ controller: VNDocumentCameraViewController)
```

## Parameters

- **controller**: The document camera view controller in which the user canceled.

## Determining scan results

- **documentCameraViewController(_:didFinishWith:)**: Tells the delegate that the user successfully saved a scanned document from the document camera.
- **documentCameraViewController(_:didFailWithError:)**: Tells the delegate that document scanning failed while the camera view controller was active.

items.description: Tells the delegate that the user successfully saved a scanned document from the document camera.
